attributes.action: abolish VAT and recoup the losses through high bracket income tax, to ensure cheaper consumer items for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The system of VAT can prevent lower earners from purchasing consumables that are too expensive. The burden should be placed on the very high earners (in the form of income tax bracket) so that all consumers can enjoy lower prices on all goods.
